summary: This is my first mod.初体験
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=5][b][u]I'm making her short quest!!
Please back me up![/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3622387-1415555735.jpg[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Sylia Follower[/size][/font]

[color=#e06666][size=4]Tell me if you find some problems.[/size][/color]
I'm not bad English and good at Japanese.
問題その他何かあればご連絡下さい。

[font=Arial][color=#ead1dc][size=4][Introduction][/size][/color][/font]
One day a girl strayed into the world of Skyrim. Fortunately,She found an opening in Riverwood.But actually she has talents of not only a service trade but also archery.So,why don't you let her show her talents?

スカイリムの世界に若い女性が迷い込んだ。幸運にもリバーウッドで仕事を見つけることが出来た彼女だが、実のところ彼女は接客のみならず弓術にも長けていた。さて、その才能を遺憾なく発揮させてあげるのはどうだろう？

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][What's This Mod?][/size][/color]
This mod Adds a STANDALONE FOLLOWER,Sylia to Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

リバーウッドの宿屋スリーピングジャイアントにスタンドアローンフォロワーSyliaを追加します。

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][About Her][/size][/color]
She is good at archery.She has almost its perks.
弓術のパークのほとんどを取得済。

[color=#ffe599]Overdraw 3
Critical Shot 2
Hunter's Discipline
Power Shot
Ranger
Quick Shot
Bullseye[/color]

And she can use a few restorations.
[b]ほんのちょっぴり回復魔法も使えます。

[color=#ffe599]Healing[/color][/b][color=#ffe599]
[/color][b][color=#ffe599]Healing Hands
[/color]
[/b][color=#ff00ff][size=6]Bodytype:UNPB-BBP[/size][/color]
[color=#444444][size=1]おっぱいぷるんぷるん[/size][/color]

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/color]
Any of Follower overhaul mods like FLP
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Credits][/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot 
[color=#6d9eeb]Morten Hair pack2 [/color](converted by  mortenhoward)
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]  by [b]HHaleyy[/b]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by [b]Blessed Redux Project team[/b]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/url] by [b]asianboy345[/b]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37673/?]Skyrim Scarves and Mufflers[/url]　by [b]cmdo[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5135/?]Triss Outfitt For TES V Skyrim[/url] by [b]Fraper[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19425/?]UNP meshes for the Triss outfit[/url] by [b]Exeter[/b]
 
[/size]I'm looking foward to your uploading [b]screen[/b] [b]shots[/b] that Sylia is in them.
ＳＳ大募集！
author: zahaku
